item.title: Python virtual environments with pyenv
item.description: Virtual environments isolate a set of executables, libraries and related files from another such set. From the python docs: A virtual environment is a Python environment such that the Python interpreter, libraries and scripts installed into it are isolated from those installed in other virtual environments, and (by default) any libraries installed in a “system” Python, i.

item.title: Writing Chapters to a Video using ffmpeg and Python
item.description: Adding Chapters to a video file is a great way to navigate through long videos (if there is a comprehensive chapter-structure in the video, that is).
